ðŸ“– Summary: VoltAgent is an open-source TypeScript framework designed to simplify the development of AI agent applications. It provides modular building blocks, standardized patterns, and abstractions for creating chatbots, virtual assistants, and automated workflows. The framework supports multi-agent systems, workflow orchestration, tool integrations, data retrieval, memory, and is compatible with popular LLMs.
